hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #3# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: Remember that time you did that really embarrassing thing?^${12 68 3A}Yikes.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path of time.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Slingshot#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that scoring 1500 in #horseback archery# grants #Ruto's Letter#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Arrows (30 pieces)# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a pool guarded by a #Tektite#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #2# major items.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to the #Royal Family's Tomb#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Arrows (10 pieces)# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the Lizalfos in Dodongo's Cavern like to play in lava.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Slingshot#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #Epona's Song#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Falling Spikes Upper Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #a Blue Potion Bottle# can be found inside #the Temple of Time#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.
